title: Biznex
headline: The Business OS for Modern Companies
tagline: Build, manage, and grow — all in one place.
copy: We're building a connected operating system for company formation and management — designed for accountants, lawyers, coworking hubs, and modern entrepreneurs.
Already in development. Partner-ready soon.

title: Why We're Building This
copy: Starting and running a business shouldn't mean juggling 10 different platforms.
Biznex unifies formation, compliance, communication, and growth into one connected ecosystem.

title: What Biznex Offers
tagline: A complete business back-office in one platform.
copy: A modular platform that covers the entire business lifecycle — from entity formation to daily operations.
Formation • Compliance • Corporate Mail • Banking • CRM • Docs • Accounting • and more.

title: For Partners
tagline: Grow your services — without building software.
copy: Biznex offers branded partner environments for accountants, lawyers, and coworking networks.
Partners provide the relationships — Biznex provides the platform.
No software to manage. Just plug in and start offering full-service business solutions.

title: Partner Benefits
copy: ✅ White-label with your brand
✅ Set your own pricing & choose features
✅ Serve clients nationwide — no location limits
✅ Earn recurring revenue per client

title: Market Landscape
tagline: A massive, growing market — ready for transformation.
copy: Over 5.4 million new businesses start yearly in the U.S. alone.
All need the same digital infrastructure — formation, compliance, banking, communication.
Biznex makes it simple, scalable, and partner-driven.

title: Product Roadmap
copy: Phase 1: Formation, Compliance, Corporate Mail, CRM, Legal Docs, Accounting, Inventory...
Phase 2: Payroll, Banking, Equity
Phase 3: Global Expansion Modules
note: Some features have not been revealed. For more details, please contact us.
